document_data.mainbody:
Ooaurtann, or Ooaurtann of Westgate, was a slaver active in the late 14 century DR.
In , when the Harper Roldro Tattershar wanted entry into Lady Joysil Ambrurs home in Marsember and was refused by her servant Elward, he name-dropped the slaver Ooaurtann, trying to be threatening.
Per the Harper Roldro Tattershar, Ooaurtann had at least one trade-agent in Marsember. The Harper gave indications he strongly believed that agent to be Elward, servant to Lady Joysil Ambrur.
